title: What Will Xbox Bring to The Game Awards?! - Kinda Funny Xcast Ep. 165
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com – Black Friday sale active from 11/17 – 11/30 and deal auto applies.

Mike and Parris are joined by Garalt of Rivia to share their big Xbox wishes for The Game Awards!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:45 - Garalt of Rivia is Here
00:08:03 - Mike’s Next Purchase
00:10:00 - Housekeeping
00:12:35 - What Will Xbox Bring to The Game Awards?
00:45:49 - Fallout Series First Look Impressions

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Games: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Plays: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnyplays?sub_confirmation=1
